name: BlockChange.us
body:
### Welcome to BlockChange.us
We are rethinking business from its roots, from who we are as human beings on this droplet of water lost in space, to the value and joy we create by our interactions.
The revolution has begun, and we want to impact it with our human values of love, trust, respect, diversity, sharing.
We believe humans will succeed to be happy living with other humans. We are here to make it easy and fun to happen.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
